hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: value
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Provide service ID to retrieve directory named as.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: file_name
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Provide configuration file for starting service.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: user_id
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Provide user's ID who trigger job.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash set -e
curl http://apiserver:8088/api/v1/jenkins-job/$user_id/$BUILD_NUMBER
cd ~
if [ ! -d "board_repo" ]; then
echo "Clone board repo as it doesn't exist yet."
git clone root@gitserver:/gitserver/repos/board_repo
fi
cd board_repo
echo "Pull changes from repo."
git pull
echo "CURL $extras with file $value/$file_name"
curl -X PATCH -H 'Content-Type: application/yaml' --data-binary @$value/$file_name $extras
